_sText:
HI there, guys! That is a remake of old nice map $2000$ originally made by Calou. I wanted make it like original, so I mostly didn't work on map design layout.
What's new?
* HDR, Cubemaps * Optimisation (Nodraw, func_detail, Hint\Skip) (now fps is in 3 times more with hdr (60-120) and in 6 without (120-160)) * 36 SpawnPoints! (earlier 32) * Some nodes for .nav file * A little texture remade (I remake some textures just to look globally better, but not seen at all) * Remade light a little (Constant = 1000)
